about us

      The main purpose of SATURDAYS ART SURF is increasing your chances to appreciate artworks on a daily basis. We tried to minimize the information about artworks, so you just browse huge amount of images of artwork and enjoy.

      In the process of building SATURDAYS ART SURF, I mainly referred to “https://sumally.com/” and “https://www.udemy.com/advanced-css-and-sass/”. In addition, we are taking advantage of data from some museums. We would like to express our sincere appreciation to them.

      We hope you enjoy SATURDAYS ART SURF and have a creative life.
